English Sentences: And Jordan was the border of it on the east side. This was the inheritance of the children of Benjamin, by the coasts thereof round about, according to their families.
Wolaitta Sentences: Arshsho baggaara de7iya zawai Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa. Biniyaama zareti laattido biittai ubbasaarakka zawatido zawati hageeta.

English Sentences: Now the cities of the tribe of the children of Benjamin according to their families were Jericho, and Bethhoglah, and the valley of Keziz,
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama zareti bantta yaran yaran ekkido katamati Yarkko, Beeti-Hoogila, Emeqi-Qaxiixa,

English Sentences: And Betharabah, and Zemaraim, and Bethel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeti-Aaraba, Xamaraima, Beeteele,

English Sentences: And Avim, and Parah, and Ophrah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Awiima, Paara, Oofira,

English Sentences: And Chepharhaammonai, and Ophni, and Gaba; twelve cities with their villages:
Wolaitta Sentences: Kaafaari-Amoona, Oofinanne Gebaa7a. Eti muleera tammanne naa77a; eta yuushuwan de7iya moottatikka etan gujettoosona.

English Sentences: Gibeon, and Ramah, and Beeroth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Gabaa7oona, Raama, Ba7eroota,

English Sentences: And Mizpeh, and Chephirah, and Mozah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Mixiphpha, Kafiira, Mooxa,

English Sentences: And Rekem, and Irpeel, and Taralah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Reqeema, Yirphpha7eela, Taraala,

English Sentences: And Zelah, Eleph, and Jebusi, which is Jerusalem, Gibeath, and Kirjath; fourteen cities with their villages. This is the inheritance of the children of Benjamin according to their families.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xelaa7a, Eleefa, Yerusalaame geetettiya Yaabuusatu katamaa, Gib77anne Qiriyaati-Yi7aariima. Eti muleera tammanne oidda; eta yuushuwan de7iya moottatikka etan gujettoosona. Biniyaama zareti bantta yaran yaran laattido biittai hagaa.

English Sentences: And the second lot came forth to Simeon, even for the tribe of the children of Simeon according to their families: and their inheritance was within the inheritance of the children of Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77antto saamai Simoona zareta eta yaran yaran gakkiis. Eta gakkida biittai Yihudaa zareti laattido biittaa giddon de7ees.

English Sentences: And they had in their inheritance Beersheba, and Sheba, and Moladah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti laattido katamati Berssaabeha woikko SHebaa7a, Molaada,

English Sentences: And Hazarshual, and Balah, and Azem,
Wolaitta Sentences: Haxaari-SHu7aala, Baala, Exeema,

English Sentences: And Eltolad, and Bethul, and Hormah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Elttolaada, Batuula, Horima,

English Sentences: And Ziklag, and Bethmarcaboth, and Hazarsusah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Xiqilaaga, Beeti-Markkaboota, Haxaari-Suusa,

English Sentences: And Bethlebaoth, and Sharuhen; thirteen cities and their villages:
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeti-Labaa7ootanne SHaruheena. Eti muleera tammanne heezza; eta yuushuwan de7iya moottati etan gujettoosona.

English Sentences: Ain, Remmon, and Ether, and Ashan; four cities and their villages:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Aina, Rimmoona, Eteeranne Ashaana. Eti muleera oiddu katamata; eta yuushuwan de7iya moottatikka etan gujettoosona.

English Sentences: And all the villages that were round about these cities to Baalathbeer, Ramath of the south. This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Simeon according to their families.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neegeeba Bazzuwan de7iya Baa7ilaati-Ba7eera woikko Raama gakkanaashin, ha katamatu yuushuwan de7iya moottata ubbaa laattidosona. Simoona zareti bantta yaran yaran laattido biittai hagaa.

English Sentences: Out of the portion of the children of Judah was the inheritance of the children of Simeon: for the part of the children of Judah was too much for them: therefore the children of Simeon had their inheritance within the inheritance of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa zareta gakkida biittai etayyo aahuwaa darido gishshau, appe shaakkin Simoona zaretussi imettiis.

English Sentences: And the third lot came up for the children of Zebulun according to their families: and the border of their inheritance was unto Sarid:
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzantto saamai Zaabiloona zareta eta yaran yaran gakkiis. Eti laattido biittai Sariida giyo katamaa gakkees.

English Sentences: And their border went up toward the sea, and Maralah, and reached to Dabbasheth, and reached to the river that is before Jokneam;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe qassi arggo baggi biidi Mar77ila kanttidi, biidi Dabasheeta bochchiiddi biidi, Yoqina7aamappe arshsho baggan de7iya shaafaa gakkees.

English Sentences: And turned from Sarid eastward toward the sunrising unto the border of Chislothtabor, and then goeth out to Daberath, and goeth up to Japhia,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hara baggaara qassi Sariida katamaappe arshsho baggi simmidi, Kisilooti-Taaboora gakkidi, Dabiraataaninne Yaafi7an zawatees.

English Sentences: And from thence passeth on along on the east to Gittahhepher, to Ittahkazin, and goeth out to Remmonmethoar to Neah;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe qassi arshsho baggaara Gaate-Hefeera, Iiti-Qaxiinanne Rimmoona gakkidi, Nee7akko mirqqettees.

English Sentences: And the border compasseth it on the north side to Hannathon: and the outgoings thereof are in the valley of Jiphthahel:
Wolaitta Sentences: Huuphessa baggaara zawai Hanatoona simmidi, Yifttaahi7eela Wombban zawatees.

English Sentences: And Kattath, and Nahallal, and Shimron, and Idalah, and Bethlehem: twelve cities with their villages.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yan Qaxaata, Naahilaala, SHimiroona, Yidaalanne Beetaliheeme geetettiya katamatikka de7oosona. Eti muleera tammanne naa77a; eta yuushuwan de7iya moottatikka etan gujettoosona.

English Sentences: This is the inheritance of the children of Zebulun according to their families, these cities with their villages.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zaabiloona zareti bantta yaran yaran laattido biittaa giddon de7iya katamatinne eta yuushuwan de7iya moottati hageeta.

English Sentences: And the fourth lot came out to Issachar, for the children of Issachar according to their families.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oiddantto saamai Yisaakoora zareta eta yaran yaran gakkiis.

English Sentences: And their border was toward Jezreel, and Chesulloth, and Shunem,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta biittaa katamati Iziraa7eela, Kasuloota, SHuneema,

English Sentences: And Haphraim, and Shihon, and Anaharath,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hafaraima, SHi7oona, Anaharaata,

English Sentences: And Rabbith, and Kishion, and Abez,
Wolaitta Sentences: Rabbiita, Qishiyoona, Abeexa,

English Sentences: And Remeth, and Engannim, and Enhaddah, and Bethpazzez;
Wolaitta Sentences: Remeeta, Engganiima, Enihaadanne Beeti-PHaxeexa.

English Sentences: And the coast reacheth to Tabor, and Shahazimah, and Bethshemesh; and the outgoings of their border were at Jordan: sixteen cities with their villages.
Wolaitta Sentences: He biittaa zawai Taaboora, SHahaxuumanne Beeti-SHemesha bochchiiddi biidi, Yorddaanoosa SHaafan zawatees. Eti muleera tammanne usuppuna; eta yuushuwan de7iya moottatikka etan gujettoosona.

English Sentences: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Issachar according to their families, the cities and their villages.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yisaakoora zareti bantta yaran yaran laattido biittaa giddon de7iya katamatinne eta yuushuwan de7iya moottati hageeta.

English Sentences: And the fifth lot came out for the tribe of the children of Asher according to their families.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ichchashantto saamai Aseera zareta eta yaran yaran gakkiis.

English Sentences: And their border was Helkath, and Hali, and Beten, and Achshaph,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta biittaa katamati Helqqaata, Hala, Bexeena, Akishaafa,

English Sentences: And Alammelech, and Amad, and Misheal; and reacheth to Carmel westward, and to Shihorlibnath;
Wolaitta Sentences: Alaameleka, Ami7aadanne Mish77aala. Arggo baggaara Qarmmeloosaaninne SHihoori-Libinaatan zawatees.

English Sentences: And turneth toward the sunrising to Bethdagon, and reacheth to Zebulun, and to the valley of Jiphthahel toward the north side of Bethemek, and Neiel, and goeth out to Cabul on the left hand,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi arshsho baggi simmi Beeti-Daagoonakko mirqqettidi, Zaabiloona biittaanne Yifttaahi7eela Wombbaa bochchiiddi biidi, Beeti-Emeeqanne Na7i7eela gakkees. Qassi huuphessa baggaara Kaabula gakkees.

English Sentences: And Hebron, and Rehob, and Hammon, and Kanah, even unto great Zidon;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe qassi Ebroona, Rahooba, Hammoonanne Qaana kanttidi, Sidoonan zawatees.

English Sentences: And then the coast turneth to Ramah, and to the strong city Tyre; and the coast turneth to Hosah; and the outgoings thereof are at the sea from the coast to Achzib:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe qassi biittaa zawai Raama simmidi, gimbbettida Xiiroosa katamaa gakkees. Hegaappe qassi Hoosakko mirqqettidi, Meediteraane Abban zawatees. Qassi Mahalaaba, Akiziiba,

English Sentences: Ummah also, and Aphek, and Rehob: twenty and two cities with their villages.
Wolaitta Sentences: Uuma, Afeeqanne Rahooba geetettiya katamatikka yan de7oosona. Eti muleera laatamanne naa77a; eta yuushuwan de7iya moottatikka etan gujettoosona.

English Sentences: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Asher according to their families, these cities with their villages.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aseera zareti bantta yaran yaran laattido biittan de7iya katamatinne eta yuushuwan de7iya moottati hageeta.

English Sentences: The sixth lot came out to the children of Naphtali, even for the children of Naphtali according to their families.
Wolaitta Sentences: Usuppuntta saamai Nifttaaleema zareta eta yaran yaran gakkiis.

English Sentences: And their coast was from Heleph, from Allon to Zaanannim, and Adami, Nekeb, and Jabneel, unto Lakum; and the outgoings thereof were at Jordan:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta zawai Heleefappenne Da7inaaniima wolaappe doommidi, Adaami-Neqeeba, Yaabini7eelanne Laaqquuma kanttidi biidi, wurssettai Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa gakkees.

English Sentences: And then the coast turneth westward to Aznothtabor, and goeth out from thence to Hukkok, and reacheth to Zebulun on the south side, and reacheth to Asher on the west side, and to Judah upon Jordan toward the sunrising.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe qassi zawai arggo baggi Azinooti-Taaboorakko mirqqettees; hegaappe qassi Huqooqa simmidi, tohossa baggaara Zaabiloona biittaaninne arggo baggaara Aseera biittan zawatidi, arshsho baggaara Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa gakkees.

English Sentences: And the fenced cities are Ziddim, Zer, and Hammath, Rakkath, and Chinnereth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Gimbbettida katamati Xiddiima, Xeera, Haamata, Raaqata, Kinaareeta,

English Sentences: And Adamah, and Ramah, and Hazor,
Wolaitta Sentences: Adaama, Raama, Haxoora,

English Sentences: And Kedesh, and Edrei, and Enhazor,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qedeesha, Ediraa7a, Enihaxoora,

English Sentences: And Iron, and Migdalel, Horem, and Bethanath, and Bethshemesh; nineteen cities with their villages.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yir77oona, Migidaali7eela, Horeema, Beeti-Anaatanne Beeti-SHemesha. Eti muleera tammanne uddufuna; eta yuushuwan de7iya moottatikka etan gujettoosona.

English Sentences: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Naphtali according to their families, the cities and their villages.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nifttaaleema zareti bantta yaran yaran laattido biittan de7iya katamatinne eta yuushuwan de7iya moottati hageeta.

English Sentences: And the seventh lot came out for the tribe of the children of Dan according to their families.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laappuntta saamai Daana zareta eta yaran yaran gakkiis.

English Sentences: And the coast of their inheritance was Zorah, and Eshtaol, and Irshemesh,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti laattido biittaa katamati Xor77a, Eshttaa7oola, Irshshemeesha,

English Sentences: And Shaalabbin, and Ajalon, and Jethlah,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHa7albbiima, Ayyaaloona, Yitaala,

English Sentences: And Elon, and Thimnathah, and Ekron,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eloona, Timina, Eqiroona,

English Sentences: And Eltekeh, and Gibbethon, and Baalath,
Wolaitta Sentences: Elttaaqe, Gibbatoona, Baa7ilaata,

English Sentences: And Jehud, and Beneberak, and Gathrimmon,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihuda, Banebaraaqa, Gaate-Rimmoona,

English Sentences: And Mejarkon, and Rakkon, with the border before Japho.
Wolaitta Sentences: Meyarqqoona, Raaqoonanne qassi Yoophphe katamaa yuushuwan de7iya heerata.

English Sentences: And the coast of the children of Dan went out too little for them: therefore the children of Dan went up to fight against Leshem, and took it, and smote it with the edge of the sword, and possessed it, and dwelt therein, and called Leshem, Dan, after the name of Dan their father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daana zareti biittaa laattanau injjetennaagaa be7ido wode, biidi Laayisha katamaa olidi xoonidosona; xoonidi he kataman de7iya asaa qara bisuwan wori wurssidi, katamaa banttau ekkidosona; ekkidi yan de7idosona. He katamaa sunttaakka laammidi, bantta aawaa Daana sunttan Daana giidi sunttidosona.

English Sentences: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Dan according to their families, these cities with their villages.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daana zareti bantta yaran yaran laattido biittan de7iya katamatinne eta yuushuwan de7iya moottati hageeta.

English Sentences: When they had made an end of dividing the land for inheritance by their coasts, the children of Israel gave an inheritance to Joshua the son of Nun among them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai biittaa shaakkidi wurssido wode, Nawe na7aa Yaasussi laattiyo biittaa bantta giddon immidosona.

English Sentences: According to the word of the LORD they gave him the city which he asked, even Timnathserah in mount Ephraim: and he built the city, and dwelt therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI azazidoogaadan, Yaasu oichchin, Efireema gezziyan de7iya Timinaati-Seraaha giyo katamaa ayyo immidosona. Immin katamaa wotti yeggi keexxidi, yan de7iis.

English Sentences: These are the inheritances, which Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun, and the heads of the fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel, divided for an inheritance by lot in Shiloh before the LORD, at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation. So they made an end of dividing the country.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeesee El77aazari, Nawe na7ai Yaasunne Israa7eela asaa zaretuyyo yaratu halaqati GODAA sinttan Seelon, Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa penggen saamaa yeggidi, gishido laata biittai hagaa. Eti biittaa yaati shaakkidi polidosona.

English Sentences: The LORD also spake unto Joshua, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI Yaasa hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Speak to the children of Israel, saying, Appoint out for you cities of refuge, whereof I spake unto you by the hand of Moses:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asaayyo hagaadan yaaga; Taani Muuse baggaara inttena azazidoogaadan, asai baqati biidi attiyo katamata doorite.

English Sentences: That the slayer that killeth any person unawares and unwittingly may flee thither: and they shall be your refuge from the avenger of blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ai asinne akeekennaaninne erennaani asa worikko, yaa baqati biidi, suuttaa achchiyaagaappe attana.

English Sentences: And when he that doth flee unto one of those cities shall stand at the entering of the gate of the city, and shall declare his cause in the ears of the elders of that city, they shall take him into the city unto them, and give him a place, that he may dwell among them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa woridaagee he katamatuppe issuwaakko baqato; baqatidi biidi, katamaa geliyo penggiyan eqqidi, hanidabaa he katamaa cimatuyyo yooto. Yootin eti bantta katamaa efiidi, i de7ana sohuwaa immin, i etaara yan de7o.

English Sentences: And if the avenger of blood pursue after him, then they shall not deliver the slayer up into his hand; because he smote his neighbour unwittingly, and hated him not beforetime.
Wolaitta Sentences: Suuttaa achchiyaagee a kaallidi yiikko, he katamaa cimati a aattidi immoppona. Aissi giikko, ba shooruwaa i halchchidi, ba kase morkketettaa gishshau woribeenna.

English Sentences: And he shall dwell in that city, until he stand before the congregation for judgment, and until the death of the high priest that shall be in those days: then shall the slayer return, and come unto his own city, and unto his own house, unto the city from whence he fled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaa7aa sinttan pirddau i eqqana gakkanaassinne he wodiyan de7iya qeese ubbatu halaqai haiqqana gakkanaassi, he kataman de7o. Hegaappe guyyiyan, baqatidi kiyido katamaa guyye simmidi, ba soo gelo yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they appointed Kedesh in Galilee in mount Naphtali, and Shechem in mount Ephraim, and Kirjatharba, which is Hebron, in the mountain of Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Israa7eela asai Nifttaaleema gezziyan, Galiilan de7iya Qedeeshanne a hentta gadeta, Efireema gezziyan de7iya Sekeemanne a hentta gadetanne Yihudaa gezziyan de7iya Qiriyaati-Arbbaa7a woikko Kebroona dummayidosona.

English Sentences: And on the other side Jordan by Jericho eastward, they assigned Bezer in the wilderness upon the plain out of the tribe of Reuben, and Ramoth in Gilead out of the tribe of Gad, and Golan in Bashan out of the tribe of Manasseh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefinttan, Yarkkoppe arshsho baggaara bazzon, xoqqasan de7iya Roobeela zaretu biittaappe Beexera, Gaada zaretu biittaappe Gala7aaden de7iya Raamootanne Minaase zaretu biittaappe Baasaanen de7iya Golaana dummayidosona.

English Sentences: These were the cities appointed for all the children of Israel, and for the stranger that sojourneth among them, that whosoever killeth any person at unawares might flee thither, and not die by the hand of the avenger of blood, until he stood before the congregation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asaa ubbaassinne eta giddon de7iya betetussi dummayido katamati hageeta; erennan de7iiddi asa worida ai asinne, yaa7aa sinttan eqqana gakkanaassi, suuttaa achchiyaagaa kushiyan haiqqennaadan, he katamatuppe issuwaakko baqatanau danddayees.

English Sentences: Then came near the heads of the fathers of the Levites unto Eleazar the priest, and unto Joshua the son of Nun, and unto the heads of the fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Leewa zaretu yaratu halaqati qeesiyaa El77aazarakko, Nawe na7aa Yaasukkonne Israa7eela asaa zaretuyyo yaratu halaqatukko shiiqidosona.

English Sentences: And they spake unto them at Shiloh in the land of Canaan, saying, The LORD commanded by the hand of Moses to give us cities to dwell in, with the suburbs thereof for our cattle.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiiqidosan Kanaane biittan de7iya Seelon eta hagaadan yaagidosona; "Nuuni de7ana katamatanne nu mehiyaassi hentta gadeta neeni nuussi immana mala GODAI Muuse baggaara azaziis" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: the children of Israel gave unto the Levites out of their inheritance, at the commandment of the LORD, these cities and their suburbs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAI azazidoogaadan, Israa7eela asai Leewa zaretuyyo ha katamatanne hentta gadeta bantta biittaappe qanxxidi etau immidosona.

English Sentences: And the lot came out for the families of the Kohathites: and the children of Aaron the priest, which were of the Levites, had by lot out of the tribe of Judah, and out of the tribe of Simeon, and out of the tribe of Benjamin, thirteen cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro saamai Qahaata yaratussi kiyiis. Qeesiyaa Aaroona zare Leewati Yihudaa zaretuppe, Simoona zaretuppenne Biniyaama zaretuppe tammanne heezzu katamata saaman ekkidosona.

English Sentences: And the rest of the children of Kohath had by lot out of the families of the tribe of Ephraim, and out of the tribe of Dan, and out of the half tribe of Manasseh, ten cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Attida Qahaata yarati Efireema zaretuppe, Daana zaretuppenne Minaase zaretu baggaappe tammu katamata saaman ekkidosona.

English Sentences: And the children of Gershon had by lot out of the families of the tribe of Issachar, and out of the tribe of Asher, and out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the half tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gershshoona yarati Yisaakoora zaretuppe, Aseera zaretuppe, Nifttaaleema zaretuppenne Baasaanen de7iya Minaase zaretu baggaappe tammanne heezzu katamata saaman ekkidosona.

English Sentences: The children of Merari by their families had out of the tribe of Reuben, and out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun, twelve cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maraara yarati Roobeela zaretuppe, Gaada zaretuppenne Zaabiloona zaretuppe tammanne naa77u katamata ekkidosona.

English Sentences: And the children of Israel gave by lot unto the Levites these cities with their suburbs, as the LORD commanded by the hand of Moses.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muuse baggaara azazidoogaadan, Israa7eela asai ha katamatanne eta hentta gadeta Leewatuyyo saaman shaakkidi immidosona.

English Sentences: And they gave out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, these cities which are here mentioned by name,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa zaretuppenne Simoona zaretuppe Israa7eela asai ekkidi immido katamatu sunttai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettiis.

English Sentences: Which the children of Aaron, being of the families of the Kohathites, who were of the children of Levi, had: for theirs was the first lot.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro saamai Leewa zaretuppe yelettidi, Qahaata yara gidida Aaroona zaretussi kiyin, etau immido katamati hageeta:

English Sentences: And they gave them the city of Arba the father of Anak, which city is Hebron, in the hill country of Judah, with the suburbs thereof round about it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai Yihudaa gezziyan de7iya Qiriyaati-Arbbaa7a woikko Kebroonanne a yuushuwan de7iya hentta gadeta etayyo immidosona. Arbbaa7i Anaaqe aawaa.

English Sentences: But the fields of the city, and the villages thereof, gave they to Caleb the son of Jephunneh for his possession.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he katamaa yuushuwan de7iya gadetanne moottata Yifune na7aa Kaaleebayyo laata oottidi immidosona.

English Sentences: Thus they gave to the children of Aaron the priest Hebron with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Libnah with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeesiyaa Aaroona zaretuyyo asa worida asi baqati biidi attiyo Kebroona katamanne a hentta gadeta, Liibinanne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: And Jattir with her suburbs, and Eshtemoa with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yattiranne a hentta gadeta, Eshttamoo7anne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: And Holon with her suburbs, and Debir with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Holoonanne a hentta gadeta, Dabiiranne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: And Ain with her suburbs, and Juttah with her suburbs, and Bethshemesh with her suburbs; nine cities out of those two tribes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ainanne a hentta gadeta, Yuuxanne a hentta gadetanne Beeti-SHemeshanne a hentta gadeta, muleera uddufun katamata Yihudaa zaretuppenne Simoona zaretuppe ekkidi immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the tribe of Benjamin, Gibeon with her suburbs, Geba with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama zaretuppe Gabaa7oonanne a hentta gadeta, Gebaa7anne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: Anathoth with her suburbs, and Almon with her suburbs; four cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Anatootanne a hentta gadetanne Almmoonanne a hentta gadeta, muleera oiddu katamata ekkidi immidosona.

English Sentences: All the cities of the children of Aaron, the priests, were thirteen cities with their suburbs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aaroona zare qeesetu katamatinne eta hentta gadeti muleera tammanne heezza.

English Sentences: And the families of the children of Kohath, the Levites which remained of the children of Kohath, even they had the cities of their lot out of the tribe of Ephraim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Attida Qahaata yarati, Leewa zare gidiyaageeti Efireema zaretu katamatuppe shaakkin ekkidosona.

English Sentences: For they gave them Shechem with her suburbs in mount Ephraim, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Gezer with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Etayyo Efireema gezziyan de7iya, asa worida asi baqati biidi attiyo Sekeemanne a hentta gadeta, Gezeeranne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: And Kibzaim with her suburbs, and Bethhoron with her suburbs; four cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qibixaimanne a hentta gadetanne Beeti-Horoonanne a hentta gadeta, muleera oiddu katamata ekkidi immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the tribe of Dan, Eltekeh with her suburbs, Gibbethon with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Daana zaretuppe Elttaaqenne a hentta gadeta, Gibbatoonanne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: Aijalon with her suburbs, Gathrimmon with her suburbs; four cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ayyaaloonanne a hentta gadetanne Gaate-Rimmoonanne a hentta gadeta, muleera oiddu katamata ekkidi immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the half tribe of Manasseh, Tanach with her suburbs, and Gathrimmon with her suburbs; two cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Minaase zaretu baggatuppe Taa7inaakanne a hentta gadetanne Gaate-Rimmoonanne a hentta gadeta, muleera naa77u katamata ekkidi immidosona.

English Sentences: All the cities were ten with their suburbs for the families of the children of Kohath that remained.
Wolaitta Sentences: Attida Qahaata yaratu katamatinne eta hentta gadeti muleera tamma.

English Sentences: And unto the children of Gershon, of the families of the Levites, out of the other half tribe of Manasseh they gave Golan in Bashan with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Beeshterah with her suburbs; two cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Minaase zaretu baggatuppe asa worida asi baqati biidi attiyo, Baasaanen de7iya Golaana katamaanne a hentta gadetanne Ba7eshttaaranne a hentta gadeta, muleera naa77u katamata ekkidi, Gershshoona yara gidiya hara Leewatuyyo immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the tribe of Issachar, Kishon with her suburbs, Dabareh with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yisaakoora zaretuppe Qishiyoonanne a hentta gadeta, Dabiraatanne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: Jarmuth with her suburbs, Engannim with her suburbs; four cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yarmmuutanne a hentta gadetanne Engganiimanne a hentta gadeta, muleera oiddu katamata ekkidi immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the tribe of Asher, Mishal with her suburbs, Abdon with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aseera zaretuppe Mish77aalanne a hentta gadeta, Abddoonanne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: Helkath with her suburbs, and Rehob with her suburbs; four cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Helqqaatanne a hentta gadetanne Rahoobanne a hentta gadeta, muleera oiddu katamata ekkidi immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Hammothdor with her suburbs, and Kartan with her suburbs; three cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka Nifttaaleema zaretuppe asa worida asi baqati biidi attiyo Galiilan de7iya Qedeeshanne a hentta gadeta, Hammootanne a hentta gadeta, Dooranne a hentta gadetanne Qarttaananne a hentta gadeta, muleera oiddu katamata ekkidi, etayyo immidosona.

English Sentences: All the cities of the Gershonites according to their families were thirteen cities with their suburbs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gershshoona yaratu katamatinne eta a hentta gadeti muleera tammanne heezza.

English Sentences: And unto the families of the children of Merari, the rest of the Levites, out of the tribe of Zebulun, Jokneam with her suburbs, and Kartah with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Attida Maraara yara gidiya Leewatuyyo Zaabiloona zaretuppe asa worida asi baqati biidi attiyo Yoqina7aamanne a hentta gadeta, Qarttanne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: Dimnah with her suburbs, Nahalal with her suburbs; four cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Diiminanne a hentta gadetanne Naahilaalanne a hentta gadeta, muleera oiddu katamata ekkidi immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer with her suburbs, and Jahazah with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Roobeela zaretuppe Beexeranne a hentta gadeta, Yahaaxanne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: Kedemoth with her suburbs, and Mephaath with her suburbs; four cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qidemootanne a hentta gadetanne Mefa7aatanne a hentta gadeta, muleera oiddu katamata ekkidi, etayyo immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Mahanaim with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Gaada zaretuppe asa worida asi baqati biidi attiyo, Gala7aaden de7iya Raamootanne a hentta gadeta, Maahinaimanne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: Heshbon with her suburbs, Jazer with her suburbs; four cities in all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haseboonanne a hentta gadetanne Yaa7izeeranne a hentta gadeta, muleera oiddu katamata ekkidi, etayyo immidosona.

English Sentences: So all the cities for the children of Merari by their families, which were remaining of the families of the Levites, were by their lot twelve cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maraara yara gidiya hara Leewatuyyo shaakkin gakkida katamati muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: All the cities of the Levites within the possession of the children of Israel were forty and eight cities with their suburbs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai laattido biittan de7iya Leewatuyyo muleera oitamanne hosppun katamati eta hentta gadetuura de7oosona.

English Sentences: These cities were every one with their suburbs round about them: thus were all these cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: He katamatu ubbaa yuushuwan hentta gadeti de7oosona.

English Sentences: And the LORD gave unto Israel all the land which he sware to give unto their fathers; and they possessed it, and dwelt therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan oottidi, GODAI eta aawatuyyo immanau caaqqido biittaa ubbaa Israa7eela asaayyo immiis; immin eti laattidi, yan de7idosona.

English Sentences: And the LORD gave them rest round about, according to all that he sware unto their fathers: and there stood not a man of all their enemies before them; the LORD delivered all their enemies into their hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI eta aawatuyyo caaqqidoogaadan, eta ubba baggaarakka shemppissiis. GODAI eta morkketa ubbaa etayyo aatti immido gishshau, eta morkketuppe issoinne etaara eqettanau danddayibeenna.

English Sentences: There failed not ought of any good thing which the LORD had spoken unto the house of Israel; all came to pass.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela asaayyo immana giido lo77o qaalaa ubbaa poliisippe attin issoinne sa7an attibeenna.

English Sentences: Then Joshua called the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half tribe of Manasseh,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Yaasu Roobeela zareta, Gaada zaretanne Minaase zaretuppe baggata xeegiis.

English Sentences: And said unto them, Ye have kept all that Moses the servant of the LORD commanded you, and have obeyed my voice in all that I commanded you:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xeegidi, "GODAA ashkkarai Muusee inttena azazido ubbaa polideta; qassi taassikka ubbaban azazettideta.

English Sentences: Ye have not left your brethren these many days unto this day, but have kept the charge of the commandment of the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro wodiyaasappe hachchi gakkanaassi, intte intte ishantta yeggibeekketa; GODAI intte Xoossai inttessi immido hadaraa polideta.

English Sentences: And now the LORD your God hath given rest unto your brethren, as he promised them: therefore now return ye, and get you unto your tents, and unto the land of your possession, which Moses the servant of the LORD gave you on the other side Jordan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi GODAI intte Xoossai etayyo giido qaalaadan, intte ishantta shemppissiis. Hegaa gishshau, GODAA ashkkarai Muusee intteyyo Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefintta baggaara immido laata biittan de7iya intte soo soo simmite.

English Sentences: But take diligent heed to do the commandment and the law, which Moses the servant of the LORD charged you, to love the LORD your God, and to walk in all his ways, and to keep his commandments, and to cleave unto him, and to serve him with all your heart and with all your soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA ashkkarai Muusee inttena azazido azazuwaanne higgiyaa mintti naagite. GODAA intte Xoossaa siiqite; a ogetu ubban hemettite; a azazuwaassi azazettite; aara minni oiqettite; intte kumetta wozanaappenne kumetta shemppuwaappe ayyo oottite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Joshua blessed them, and sent them away: and they went unto their tents.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaasu eta anjjidi yeddiiddi hagaadan yaagiis; "Be7ite, intte ha77i daro mehiyaa, biraa, worqqaa, nahaasiyaa, birataanne daro maayuwaa ekki duretidi, intte biittaa simmana haneeta. Hegaa gishshau intte morkketuppe omooddidoogaa, intte ishanttuura shaakki ekkite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now to the one half of the tribe of Manasseh Moses had given possession in Bashan: but unto the other half thereof gave Joshua among their brethren on this side Jordan westward. And when Joshua sent them away also unto their tents, then he blessed them,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan eti bantta soo soo biidosona. Muusee Minaase zaretuppe baggatussi Baasaanen biittaa immi wottiis;

English Sentences: And he spake unto them, saying, Return with much riches unto your tents, and with very much cattle, with silver, and with gold, and with brass, and with iron, and with very much raiment: divide the spoil of your enemies with your brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin attida Minaase zaretu baggatussi Yaasu Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe arggo baggan hara zaretuura issippe laattiyo biittaa immiis.

English Sentences: And the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh returned, and departed from the children of Israel out of Shiloh, which is in the land of Canaan, to go unto the country of Gilead, to the land of their possession, whereof they were possessed, according to the word of the LORD by the hand of Moses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Roobeela zareti, Gaada zaretinne Minaase zaretu baggati bantta laata biittaa simmidi biidosona. GODAI Muuse baggaara azazin laattido Gala7aade biittaa baanau, Kanaane biittan Seelon de7iya Israa7eela asaappe shaakettidosona.

English Sentences: And when they came unto the borders of Jordan, that are in the land of Canaan, the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh built there an altar by Jordan, a great altar to see to.
Wolaitta Sentences: Roobeela zareti, Gaada zaretinne Minaase zaretuppe baggati Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa matan Kanaane biittan de7iya Galiloota yiido wode, shaafaa matan yarshshuwaa yarshshiyo gita sohuwaa gimbbidosona.

English Sentences: And the children of Israel heard say, Behold, the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh have built an altar over against the land of Canaan, in the borders of Jordan, at the passage of the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gimbbin, "Roobeela zareti, Gaada zaretinne Minaase zaretuppe baggati Yorddaanoosa matan, Galilootan, Kanaane zawan, Israa7eelatu baggaara yarshsho sohuwaa gimbbidosona" giyoogaa Israa7eelati siyidosona.

English Sentences: And when the children of Israel heard of it, the whole congregation of the children of Israel gathered themselves together at Shiloh, to go up to war against them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyinne kumetta Israa7eela asaa yaa7ai eta olanau baanau Seelo giyoosan issippe shiiqiis.

English Sentences: And the children of Israel sent unto the children of Reuben, and to the children of Gad, and to the half tribe of Manasseh, into the land of Gilead, Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiiqidi Israa7eela asai qeesiyaa El77aazara na7aa Piinihaasa, Gala7aade biittan de7iya Roobeela zaretukko, Gaada zaretukkonne Minaase zaretuppe baggatukko kiittiis.

English Sentences: And with him ten princes, of each chief house a prince throughout all the tribes of Israel; and each one was an head of the house of their fathers among the thousands of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi zaree ba yaratu halaqatuppe issi issi asa dooridi, tammu asaa Piinihaasaara yeddiis.

English Sentences: And they came unto the children of Reuben, and to the children of Gad, and to the half tribe of Manasseh, unto the land of Gilead, and they spake with them, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Roobeela zareti, Gaada zaretinne Minaase zaretu baggati de7iyo Gala7aade biittaa biidosona. Biidi eta,

English Sentences: Thus saith the whole congregation of the LORD, What trespass is this that ye have committed against the God of Israel, to turn away this day from following the LORD, in that ye have builded you an altar, that ye might rebel this day against the LORD?
Wolaitta Sentences: asai kumetta yaa7ai inttena hagaadan yaagees; Israa7eela Xoossaa bolli aissi hagaa mala iitabaa oottidetii? Waanidi giikko, intte hara yarshsho sohuwaa intteyyo gimbbidi, GODAA bolli makkalideta! A kaalliyoogaakka aggideta!

English Sentences: Is the iniquity of Peor too little for us, from which we are not cleansed until this day, although there was a plague in the congregation of the LORD,
Wolaitta Sentences: Pa7ooran nuuni oottido nagarai nuuyyo gidennee? Israa7eela yaa7aa bolli boshai wodhdhidabaa gidikkonne, hachchi gakkanaassikka nuuni he nagaraappe geeyibookko.

English Sentences: But that ye must turn away this day from following the LORD? and it will be, seeing ye rebel to day against the LORD, that to morrow he will be wroth with the whole congregation of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA kaalliyoogaappe hachchikka wora simmuuteetiiyye? "Intte hachchi GODAA bolli makkalikko, GODAI wontto kumetta Israa7eela yaa7aa hanqqettana.

English Sentences: Notwithstanding, if the land of your possession be unclean, then pass ye over unto the land of the possession of the LORD, wherein the LORD's tabernacle dwelleth, and take possession among us: but rebel not against the LORD, nor rebel against us, in building you an altar beside the altar of the LORD our God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte de7iyo biittai tunidabaa gidikko, GODAA Dunkkaanee eqqido biittaa haa yiidi, nunaara gadiyaa shaakkite. SHin kaseppe de7iya GODAA nu Xoossaa yarshsho sohuwaappe hara yarshsho sohuwaa gimbbidi, Xoossaa bolli makkaloppite; woikko nunakka makkalanchcha kessoppite.

English Sentences: Did not Achan the son of Zerah commit a trespass in the accursed thing, and wrath fell on all the congregation of Israel? and that man perished not alone in his iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zaraaha zaree Akkaani hirima giidobaappe ekkidi, nagaraa oottido gishshau, kumetta Israa7eela yaa7aa bolli GODAA hanqqoi wodhdhibeennee? Ba nagaraa gaasuwan haiqqidai a xalaalaa gidenna yaagees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh answered, and said unto the heads of the thousands of Israel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Roobeela zareti, Gaada zaretinne Minaase zaretuppe baggati Israa7eela yaratu halaqatuyyo hagaadan yaagidi zaaridosona;

English Sentences: The LORD God of gods, the LORD God of gods, he knoweth, and Israel he shall know; if it be in rebellion, or if in transgression against the LORD, (save us not this day,)
Wolaitta Sentences: "Wolqqaamai Xoossaa GODAA! Wolqqaamai Xoossaa GODAA! Nuuni hagaa aibissi oottidaakko i erees! Nuuni aibissi oottidaakko inttekka eranaadan koyoos. Nuuni GODAA bollan makkalidabanne azazettennan ixxidabaa gidikko, hachchi nuna paxa wottoppite.

English Sentences: That we have built us an altar to turn from following the LORD, or if to offer thereon burnt offering or meat offering, or if to offer peace offerings thereon, let the LORD himself require it;
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni GODAA kaalliyoogaa aggidi, xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa, kattaa yarshshuwaanne issippetettaa yarshshuwaa yarshshanaunne yarshshiyo sohuwaa gimbbidabaa gidikko, GODAI nuna he autiyaa achcho.

English Sentences: And if we have not rather done it for fear of this thing, saying, In time to come your children might speak unto our children, saying, What have ye to do with the LORD God of Israel?
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni hegaassi gimbbibookko; nuuni yarshsho sohuwaa gimbbidoogee, sinttappe yaana laittan intte naati nu naata, Inttena GODAN Israa7eela Xoossan aibee gattiyai?

English Sentences: For the LORD hath made Jordan a border between us and you, ye children of Reuben and children of Gad; ye have no part in the LORD: so shall your children make our children cease from fearing the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, Roobeelanne Gaada zaretoo, GODAI nu giddooninne intte giddon Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa zawayiis. GODAN inttena gattiyaabi baawa yaaganaakkonne giidi hirggido gishshaassa. Hegaadan oottidi, intte zareti nu zareta GODAAYYO goinnennaadan teqqennan aggokkona.

English Sentences: Therefore we said, Let us now prepare to build us an altar, not for burnt offering, nor for sacrifice:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau nuuni nu giddon yarshsho sohuwaa ane gimbboos giida; shin xuuggiyo yarshshuwaassa woikko hara yarshshuwaassa gidenna.

English Sentences: But that it may be a witness between us, and you, and our generations after us, that we might do the service of the LORD before him with our burnt offerings, and with our sacrifices, and with our peace offerings; that your children may not say to our children in time to come, Ye have no part in the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni yarshsho sohuwaa gimbbidoogee xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa, issippetettaa yarshshuwaanne hara yarshshuwaa yarshshiiddi, GODAASSI a Dunkkaaniyan goinnana mala, hagee nu gidduwaaninne intte gidduwaani, qassi nu kaalliya yeletaa gidduwan markka gidanaassa. Wodeppe intte zareti nu zareta, Inttena GODAN gattiyaabi aibinne baawa gaanau danddayokkona.

English Sentences: Therefore said we, that it shall be, when they should so say to us or to our generations in time to come, that we may say again, Behold the pattern of the altar of the LORD, which our fathers made, not for burnt offerings, nor for sacrifices; but it is a witness between us and you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti geelladan nuna woikko nu yeletaa wodeppe hegaadan giikko, nuuni etau zaaridi, GODAASSI yarshshiyo sohuwaa leemisuwaa hagaa be7ite. Hagaa nu aawati xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne hara yarshshuwaa yarshshanaassa gidennan, intteppenne nuuppenne gidduwan markka gidana mala gimbbidosona yaagana.

English Sentences: God forbid that we should rebel against the LORD, and turn this day from following the LORD, to build an altar for burnt offerings, for meat offerings, or for sacrifices, beside the altar of the LORD our God that is before his tabernacle.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA bolli makkalanaagee nuuppe haakko! GODAA nu Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa sinttan eqqida yarshshuwaasaappe haraa, xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa, kattaa yarshshuwaanne hara yarshshuwaa yarshshiyo sohuwaa gimbbidi, hachchi wora simmibookko" yaagidi zaaridosona.

English Sentences: And when Phinehas the priest, and the princes of the congregation and heads of the thousands of Israel which were with him, heard the words that the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the children of Manasseh spake, it pleased them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeesee Piinihaasinne aara de7iya Israa7eela yaratu halaqati, Roobeela, Gaadanne Minaase zareti yootidoogaa siyidi, keehi ufaittidosona.

English Sentences: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest said unto the children of Reuben, and to the children of Gad, and to the children of Manasseh, This day we perceive that the LORD is among us, because ye have not committed this trespass against the LORD: now ye have delivered the children of Israel out of the hand of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeesiyaa El77aazara na7ai Piinihaasi Roobeela, Gaadanne Minaase zaretussi, "GODAI nu giddon de7iyoogaa nuuni hachchi erida; aissi giikko, ha yohuwaa intte GODAA bolli makkalanau oottibeekketa. Intte ha77i GODAA qixaatiyaappe Israa7eela asaa ashshideta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest, and the princes, returned from the children of Reuben, and from the children of Gad, out of the land of Gilead, unto the land of Canaan, to the children of Israel, and brought them word again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan qeesiyaa El77aazara na7ai Piinihaasinne halaqati Gala7aaden de7iya Roobeelanne Gaada zaretu matappe Kanaanen de7iya Israa7eela asaakko simmidosona; simmidi hanidabaa etayyo yootidosona.

English Sentences: And the thing pleased the children of Israel; and the children of Israel blessed God, and did not intend to go up against them in battle, to destroy the land wherein the children of Reuben and Gad dwelt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yootidobai Israa7eela asaa ufaissin, Xoossaa galatidosona. Qassi Roobeela asatinne Gaada asati de7iyo biittaa olidi bashshanau baanau haasayiyoogaakka aggi bayidosona.

English Sentences: And the children of Reuben and the children of Gad called the altar Ed: for it shall be a witness between us that the LORD is God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Roobeelanne Gaada zareti, "Ha yarshsho sohoi GODAA xalaalai Xoossaa gidiyoogau nu ubbaappe gidduwan markka gidana" yaagidosona; yaagidi he yarshsho sohuwaa Markka sunttidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass a long time after that the LORD had given rest unto Israel from all their enemies round about, that Joshua waxed old and stricken in age.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro wodiyaappe guyyiyan, GODAI Israa7eela asaa eta yuushuwan de7iya morkketu ubbaappe shemppissiis. He wode Yaasu cimidi, wodiyaa keehippe sugiis.

English Sentences: And Joshua called for all Israel, and for their elders, and for their heads, and for their judges, and for their officers, and said unto them, I am old and stricken in age:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidaagee Israa7eela asaa ubbaa, cimata, halaqata, daannatanne ola gadaawata issippe xeegidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Taani cimada, wodiyaa keehippe sugaas.

English Sentences: And ye have seen all that the LORD your God hath done unto all these nations because of you; for the LORD your God is he that hath fought for you.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intte Xoossai intte gishshau ha kawotettata ubbaa oottidobaa intte intte huuphiyau be7ideta. Intteyyo olettidaagee GODAA intte Xoossaattenne.

English Sentences: Behold, I have divided unto you by lot these nations that remain, to be an inheritance for your tribes, from Jordan, with all the nations that I have cut off, even unto the great sea westward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite, Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe doommidi arggo baggaara de7iya Meediteraane Abbaa gakkanaassi de7iya, attida kawotettatu biitta ubbaa, taani xaissido kawotettatu biittaarakka laata gade oottada, intte zaretuyyo taani shaakkada immaas.

English Sentences: And the LORD your God, he shall expel them from before you, and drive them from out of your sight; and ye shall possess their land, as the LORD your God hath promised unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intte Xoossai eta sugananne intte sinttaappe laaggana; laaggin GODAI intte Xoossai giidoogaadan, intte eta biittaa laattana.

English Sentences: Be ye therefore very courageous to keep and to do all that is written in the book of the law of Moses, that ye turn not aside therefrom to the right hand or to the left;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, Muuse Higgiyaa Maxaafan xaafettida ubbaa naaganaunne oottanau keehippe minnite; appe ushachchi haddirssi gooppite.

English Sentences: That ye come not among these nations, these that remain among you; neither make mention of the name of their gods, nor cause to swear by them, neither serve them, nor bow yourselves unto them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagan intte giddon attida ha kawotettatuura walahettoppite. Eta xoossatu sunttaa denttoppite woikko eta sunttan caaqqoppite. Etayyo oottoppite woikko etayyo goinnoppite.

English Sentences: But cleave unto the LORD your God, as ye have done unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hachchi gakkanaassi intte oottidoogaadan, GODAA intte Xoossaa mintti oiqqite.

English Sentences: For the LORD hath driven out from before you great nations and strong: but as for you, no man hath been able to stand before you unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aissi giikko, GODAI gitanne mino kawotettata intte sinttappe kessiis. Inttena gidikko, hachchi gakkanaassi ooninne inttenaara eqettanau danddayibeenna.

English Sentences: One man of you shall chase a thousand: for the LORD your God, he it is that fighteth for you, as he hath promised you.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intte Xoossai intteyyo giidoogaadan, i ba huuphen intteyyo olettiyo gishshau, intteppe issi asi sha7u asaa yedettees.

English Sentences: Take good heed therefore unto yourselves, that ye love the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA intte Xoossaa ubbaton siiqanaagaa dogoppite.

English Sentences: Else if ye do in any wise go back, and cleave unto the remnant of these nations, even these that remain among you, and shall make marriages with them, and go in unto them, and they to you:
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte guyye simmidi, kawotettatuppe hagan intte giddon attida asaara issuwaa gidikko, eta maccaasaa intteyyo, intte maccaasaa etayyo immi walahettikko,

English Sentences: Know for a certainty that the LORD your God will no more drive out any of these nations from before you; but they shall be snares and traps unto you, and scourges in your sides, and thorns in your eyes, until ye perish from off this good land which the LORD your God hath given you.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intte Xoossai ha kawotettata intte sinttaappe gooddiiddi de7i bayennaagaa geeshshidi erite. SHin GODAI intte Xoossai immido ha lo77o biittaappe intte xayana gakkanaassi, eti intteyyo pirenne gite gidana; intte zokkuwaayyo lisso, intte aifiyaayyookka aguntta gidana.

English Sentences: And, behold, this day I am going the way of all the earth: and ye know in all your hearts and in all your souls, that not one thing hath failed of all the good things which the LORD your God spake concerning you; all are come to pass unto you, and not one thing hath failed thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77i simmi taani haiqqana mataas. GODAI intte Xoossai intteyyo immana giido lo77o ubbaappe issibinne attibeennaagaa intte ubbai intte wozanaaninne shemppuwan ereeta. I intteyyo immana giidobaappe issibinne attennan, ubbai polettiis.

English Sentences: Therefore it shall come to pass, that as all good things are come upon you, which the LORD your God promised you; so shall the LORD bring upon you all evil things, until he have destroyed you from off this good land which the LORD your God hath given you.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intte Xoossai intteyyo immana giido lo77obai ubbai attennan polettidoogaadan, GODAI intte Xoossai intteyyo immido ha lo77o biittaappe inttena xaissana gakkanaassi, iita qixaatiyaa ubbaakka intte bollan hegaadan ehaana.

English Sentences: When ye have transgressed the covenant of the LORD your God, which he commanded you, and have gone and served other gods, and bowed yourselves to them; then shall the anger of the LORD be kindled against you, and ye shall perish quickly from off the good land which he hath given unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intte Xoossai inttenaara maacettido maachchaa intte kanttikko, biidi hara xoossatussi oottikkonne goinnikko, GODAA hanqqoi intte bolli eexxi kiyana; i intteyyo immido lo77o biittaappekka intte eesuwan xayana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Joshua gathered all the tribes of Israel to Shechem, and called for the elders of Israel, and for their heads, and for their judges, and for their officers; and they presented themselves before God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Yaasu Israa7eela zaretu ubbaa Sekeema giyo kataman shiishshiis. Cimata, halaqata, daannatanne ola gadaawata ubbaa xeegiis; xeegin eti Xoossaa sinttan shiiqidosona.

English Sentences: And Joshua said unto all the people, Thus saith the LORD God of Israel, Your fathers dwelt on the other side of the flood in old time, even Terah, the father of Abraham, and the father of Nachor: and they served other gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaasu asau ubbau hagaadan yaagiis; "GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; Beni intte aawati Efiraaxiisa SHaafaappe hefinttan de7idosona; eti hara xoossatussi oottidosona. Etappe issoi Abrahaamanne Naakoora aawaa Taara.

English Sentences: And I took your father Abraham from the other side of the flood, and led him throughout all the land of Canaan, and multiplied his seed, and gave him Isaac.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan intte aawaa Abrahaama, he shaafaappe hefinttan de7iya biittaappe xeesada, Kanaane biitta ubban kaalettaas. A zariyaakka corayaas; Yisaaqakka au immaas.

English Sentences: And I gave unto Isaac Jacob and Esau: and I gave unto Esau mount Seir, to possess it; but Jacob and his children went down into Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yisaaqassikka Yaaqoobanne Eesawa immaas. Eesawassi Eedooma gezziyaa laattanaadan immaas; shin Yaaqoobinne a naati duge Gibxxe biidosona.

English Sentences: I sent Moses also and Aaron, and I plagued Egypt, according to that which I did among them: and afterward I brought you out.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Guyyeppe Muusanne Aaroona kiittada taani yan oottidoban Gibxxe biittaa asaa boshan shocaas; hegaappe guyyiyan inttena kessaas.

English Sentences: And I brought your fathers out of Egypt: and ye came unto the sea; and the Egyptians pursued after your fathers with chariots and horsemen unto the Red sea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intte aawata Gibxxeppe kessin, Zo7o Abbaakko yiideta; yin Gibxxeti intte aawata parati goochchiyo gaaretuuninne paraasatun yedettidosona.

English Sentences: And when they cried unto the LORD, he put darkness between you and the Egyptians, and brought the sea upon them, and covered them; and your eyes have seen what I have done in Egypt: and ye dwelt in the wilderness a long season.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti GODAASSI waassido wode, etappenne Gibxxetuppe gidduwan xumaa yeggaas; yaatada, abbai eta bolli simmanaadaaninne eta muukkanaadan oottaas. Taani Gibxxetu bolli oottidobaa intte intte aifiyan be7ideta. Inttekka bazzon daro wodiyaa de7ideta.

English Sentences: And I brought you into the land of the Amorites, which dwelt on the other side Jordan; and they fought with you: and I gave them into your hand, that ye might possess their land; and I destroyed them from before you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe arshsho baggaara de7iya Amooretu biittaa taani inttena ehaas. Eti inttenaara olettin, taani eta intte kushiyan aattada immaas; immin eta biittaa laattideta. Qassi taani eta intte sinttaappe xaissaas.

English Sentences: Then Balak the son of Zippor, king of Moab, arose and warred against Israel, and sent and called Balaam the son of Beor to curse you:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Xippoora na7ai Baalaaqi, Moo7aaba biittaa kawoi denddidi, Israa7eelatuura olettiis. Ba7oora na7ai Balaami inttena qangganaadan, kiittidi xeesissiis;

English Sentences: But I would not hearken unto Balaam; therefore he blessed you still: so I delivered you out of his hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin taani Balaamabaa siyabeikke. Hegaa gishshau i inttena anjjiis; Yaatin, taani inttena Baalaaqa kushiyaappe ashshaas.

English Sentences: And ye went over Jordan, and came unto Jericho: and the men of Jericho fought against you, the Amorites, and the Perizzites, and the Canaanites, and the Hittites, and the Girgashites, the Hivites, and the Jebusites; and I delivered them into your hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ashshin Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinnidi, Yarkko yiideta; yin Yarkko asainne Amooreti, Parzzeti, Kanaaneti, Hiiteti, Gerggeeseti, Hiiwetinne Yaabuusati inttenaara olettin, taani eta intte kushiyan aattada immaas.

English Sentences: And I sent the hornet before you, which drave them out from before you, even the two kings of the Amorites; but not with thy sword, nor with thy bow.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kashiyaa intteppe sinttau kiittada, Amooretu kawota naa77ata intte sinttaappe kessaas. Hagee ubbai hananau danddayidoogee, intte bisuwaaninne intte wonddafiyaani gidenna.

English Sentences: And I have given you a land for which ye did not labour, and cities which ye built not, and ye dwell in them; of the vineyards and oliveyards which ye planted not do ye eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte oottidi kessibeenna biittaanne intte keexxibeenna katamata taani intteyyo immin, an de7eeta. Ha77i intte tokkibeenna woiniyaa turaa aifiyaanne wogaraa aifiyaa meeta yaagees.

English Sentences: Now therefore fear the LORD, and serve him in sincerity and in truth: and put away the gods which your fathers served on the other side of the flood, and in Egypt; and serve ye the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau ha77ikka GODAAYYO yayyite; tumu wozanaappe ammanettidi ayyo goinnite. Intte maizza aawati Efiraaxiisa SHaafaappe hefinttaaninne Gibxxen goinnido allaga xoossata wora olidi, GODAAYYO goinnite.

English Sentences: And if it seem evil unto you to serve the LORD, choose you this day whom ye will serve; whether the gods which your fathers served that were on the other side of the flood, or the gods of the Amorites, in whose land ye dwell: but as for me and my house, we will serve the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI goinniyoogee inttena iitikko, intte aawati shaafaappe hefinttan de7iiddi goinnido xoossata gidin, woikko ha77i intte de7iyo Amoore biittaa asatu xoossata gidin, intte goinnanaagaa hachchi doorite. SHin tananne ta keettaa asaa gidikko, nuuni GODAAYYO goinnana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the people answered and said, God forbid that we should forsake the LORD, to serve other gods;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin asai zaaridi, "GODAA aggi bayidi, hara xoossatussi goinnanaagee nuuppe haakko!

English Sentences: For the LORD our God, he it is that brought us up and our fathers out of the land of Egypt, from the house of bondage, and which did those great signs in our sight, and preserved us in all the way wherein we went, and among all the people through whom we passed:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe biittaappe, ailletettaa keettaappe, nunanne nu aawata kessidi ehidaagee, he gita malaatata nu xeellishin oottidaagee, nuuni biido oge ubbaaninne kanttido biittatu ubbaa giddon nuna naagidaagee, GODAA nu Xoossaattenne.

English Sentences: And the LORD drave out from before us all the people, even the Amorites which dwelt in the land: therefore will we also serve the LORD; for he is our God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi GODAI asaa ubbaa, he biittan de7iya Amoore asatuurakka nu sinttaappe laaggidi kessiis. Hegaa gishshau nuunikka GODAASSI goinnana; aissi giikko, i nu Xoossaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Joshua said unto the people, Ye cannot serve the LORD: for he is an holy God; he is a jealous God; he will not forgive your transgressions nor your sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yaasu asaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Intte GODAAYYO goinnanau danddayekketa. Aissi giikko, i geeshsha Xoossaa; i qanaatiya Xoossaa; i intte naaquwaa woikko intte nagaraa atto geenna.

English Sentences: If ye forsake the LORD, and serve strange gods, then he will turn and do you hurt, and consume you, after that he hath done you good.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte GODAA aggidi, allaga xoossatussi goinnikko, i intteyyo lo77obaa oottidoogaappe guyyiyan, simmidi inttena qohananne xaissana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the people said unto Joshua, Nay; but we will serve the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin asai Yaasa, "CHii, chii! Nuuni GODAAYYO goinnana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Joshua said unto the people, Ye are witnesses against yourselves that ye have chosen you the LORD, to serve him. And they said, We are witnesses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yaasu asaa, "Intte GODAASSI goinnanaagaa dooridoogau intte huuphiyau intte markka" yaagiis. Yaagin eti, "Ee nuuni markka!" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Now therefore put away, said he, the strange gods which are among you, and incline your heart unto the LORD God of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaasu, "Yaatikko, intte giddon de7iya allaga xoossata wora olite; intte wozanaa GODAAKKO, Israa7eela Xoossaakko zaarite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the people said unto Joshua, The LORD our God will we serve, and his voice will we obey.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti, "Nuuni GODAASSI, nu Xoossaassi, goinnana; a azazuwaakka polana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: So Joshua made a covenant with the people that day, and set them a statute and an ordinance in Shechem.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi Yaasu asaara maachchaa maacettiis; maacettidi, Sekeeman higgiyaanne wogaa etau kessiis.

English Sentences: And Joshua wrote these words in the book of the law of God, and took a great stone, and set it up there under an oak, that was by the sanctuary of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kessidi Yaasu he qaalata Xoossaa Higgiyaa Maxaafan xaafiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, issi gita shuchchaa ekkidi, GODAA Dunkkaaniyaa matan de7iya wolaa garssan essiis.

English Sentences: And Joshua said unto all the people, Behold, this stone shall be a witness unto us; for it hath heard all the words of the LORD which he spake unto us: it shall be therefore a witness unto you, lest ye deny your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaasu asau ubbau, "Be7ite, GODAI nuuyyo haasayido qaalaa ubbaa ha shuchchai siyido gishshau, i nu bolli markka gidana. Intte Xoossaa bollan makkalikko, ha shuchchai intte bolli markka gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Joshua let the people depart, every man unto his inheritance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yaasu asaa ubbaa yeddin, ubbaikka ba laata biitti biitti simmidi biis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass after these things, that Joshua the son of Nun, the servant of the LORD, died, being an hundred and ten years old.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAA ashkkarai, Nawe na7ai Yaasu, laittai xeetanne tammaa gidin haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And they buried him in the border of his inheritance in Timnathserah, which is in mount Ephraim, on the north side of the hill of Gaash.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haiqqin asai Ga7aasha Deriyaappe huuphessa baggan, Efireema gezziyan de7iya a laata gadiyan, Timinaati-Seeran moogidosona.

English Sentences: And Israel served the LORD all the days of Joshua, and all the days of the elders that overlived Joshua, and which had known all the works of the LORD, that he had done for Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaasu paxa de7ido wode ubbaaninne Yaasuppe simmin de7idi, Xoossai Israa7eelatussi oottido ooso ubbaa erida cimatu wode ubban Israa7eelati GODAASSI goinnidosona.

English Sentences: And the bones of Joseph, which the children of Israel brought up out of Egypt, buried they in Shechem, in a parcel of ground which Jacob bought of the sons of Hamor the father of Shechem for an hundred pieces of silver: and it became the inheritance of the children of Joseph.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai Gibxxe biittaappe ehiido Yooseefa meqettaa Sekeeman moogidosona. He sohuwaa Yaaqoobi SHekeema aawaa Hamoora naatuppe xeetu xaqara biran shammiis; shammin guyyeppe Yooseefa zareti laattidosona.

English Sentences: And Eleazar the son of Aaron died; and they buried him in a hill that pertained to Phinehas his son, which was given him in mount Ephraim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aaroona na7ai El77aazari haiqqiis; haiqqin a na7aa Piinihaasassi imettida Efireema gezziyan de7iya Gib77a giyo kataman moogidosona.
